full_summary:
=====================================

**Retender of Sample Collection Services RFP**
############################################

**Reference Number:** WS4320882934-Doc4544317319
**Publication Date:** April 18, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 1, 2024 at 2 p.m. EDT
**Remote Bid Submission Deadline:** May 1, 2024 at 2 p.m. EDT

**Notice Description:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Sample Collection services for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA).

**Bid Solicitation Number:** 39903-230370/B
**Procurement Category:** Engineering and Research and Technology Based Services

**Key Details:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Attachments:**
None

**Links:**
Discovery Ariba Website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19442597?extsite=MTk0NDI1OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Contact Information:**
Stefano, Samuel (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: N/A
Email: [samuel.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samuel.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Save for appropriate use, the submission deadline has been extended to May 1, 2024, and the original deadline has been effectively canceled due to a newer notification posted. Bids must be submitted by 2 p.m. EDT to be considered valid.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Highest combined rating of technical merit and price

Please see the full notice for more detailed information and requirements. Note that bid submissions after the deadline will be discarded. Follow hereby formatted for easier note-taking and referencing.

Routine edits to clarity formatting in the process of transcribing information - basically
